This function creates a patient made up of randomised variables, consiting of: 

- given name
- family name
- address lines (5 lines in total)
- postcode
- gender
- birthdate

it can be used to create a Patient using the Personal Demographics service - HL7 V3 API

request.description:
This test validates that all Patient Related Person data is mapped correctly to the Fhir PDS RelatedPerson response, specifically:

* Related Person Address
* Related Person CorrespondenceIndicator Extension -  when it is marked as "yes"
* Related Person PreferredContactMethod Extension - where it is set to "email"
* Related Person PreferredContactTimes Extension - when it has been set
* Related Person PreferredWrittenCommunicationFormat Extension - when it has been set to "Large Print"
* Related Person Language Extension - when a language has been set and intepreter required set to "yes"
* Related Person Name
* Related Person Period start date
* Related Person RelationshipType - when type has been set to brother
* Related Person RelationshipClass - when class has been set to Agent
* Related Person Next of Kin - when next of kin has been set to "yes"
* Related Person Telecom
